description:
Job Descriptions
  • Membantu dalam merancang dan mengimplementasikan kampanye pemasaran digital di platform seperti Instagram, Facebook, dan lainnya.
  • Mengelola dan mengoptimalkan konten media sosial untuk meningkatkan interaksi dan pengikut.
  • Berkolaborasi dengan tim desain dan konten untuk menghasilkan materi pemasaran yang menarik dan relevan.
  • Mempelajari tren pemasaran digital terbaru dan memberikan ide-ide kreatif untuk meningkatkan strategi pemasaran.

Job Requirements
  • Siswa/mahasiswa dari jurusan terkait (Marketing, Komunikasi, Manajemen, atau bidang lainnya).
  • Memiliki minat kuat dalam bidang pemasaran digital, media sosial, atau analisis data.
  • Kreatif, analitis, dan memiliki kemampuan komunikasi yang baik.
  • Mampu bekerja secara mandiri maupun dalam tim.

Benefits
  • Pengalaman langsung dalam menjalankan aktivitas digital marketing.
  • Pelatihan dalam penggunaan alat-alat pemasaran digital dan analitik.
  • Sertifikat magang setelah menyelesaikan program.
  • Bimbingan dari para profesional di bidang pemasaran digital.
  • Potensi untuk direkrut menjadi karyawan tetap (berdasarkan evaluasi kinerja).
skills: Teamwork, Digital Marketing, Photo Editing, Video Editing

description:
Responsibilities:
• Develop and execute strategic marketing plans to promote club development projects
• Conduct market research and analysis to identify target demographics, market trends, and competitive landscape.
• Create compelling marketing collateral, including brochures, websites, social media content, and advertising campaigns.
• Manage digital marketing initiatives, including SEO, SEM, email marketing, and social media advertising, to increase brand visibility and generate leads.
• Coordinate with internal teams, external agencies, and stakeholders to ensure seamless execution of marketing initiatives.
• Plan and execute events, such as open houses, launch parties, and community outreach programs, to engage potential buyers and promote brand awareness.
• Monitor and analyze marketing performance metrics, such as website traffic, lead conversion rates, and ROI, and adjust strategies as needed to optimize results.
• Stay updated on industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies in real estate marketing to maintain a competitive edge.
• Collaborate with teams to develop effective efforts marketing materials and resources.
Minimum Qualifications
• Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or related field.
• Minimum proven experience marketing, with a minimum of 3 years in digital marketing.
• Experience in a marketing management role in the hospitality and/or Real Estate sector highly desirable.
• Strong understanding of real estate industry dynamics, market trends, and customer preferences.
• Demonstrated ability to develop and execute strategic marketing plans that drive results and achieve business objectives.
• Proficiency in digital marketing platforms and tools, including Google Analytics, CRM systems, and social media management tools.
• Excellent communication skills, with the ability to articulate complex ideas clearly and persuasively.
• Creative thinking and problem-solving skills, with a passion for innovation and continuous improvement.
Strong project management skills, with the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet tight deadlines.
Collaborative mindset, with the ability to work effectively in cross-functional teams and build relationships with internal and external stakeholders.)
Required Skills
• Advertisement Design
• Marketing Knowledge
• Digital Marketing
• Strategic Planning
• Advertising Design
skills: Teamwork, Digital Marketing, Marketing Management

description:
Deskripsi Pekerjaan
  • Mengelola akun media sosial (Instagram, TikTok, dll.).
  • Menyusun dan memposting konten secara rutin sesuai dengan jadwal yang telah ditetapkan
  • Mengembangkan strategi media sosial untuk meningkatkan brand awareness, engagement, dan pengikut di platform seperti Instagram, Tiktok dan lainnya.
  • Mengambil video untuk kebutuhan social media
  • Membuat, merencanakan, dan mempublikasikan konten yang menarik dan berkualitas tinggi sesuai dengan jadwal yang telah ditetapkan
  • Mengelola kalender konten dan memastikan semua postingan konsisten dengan suara dan identitas merek
  • Mengisi suara (dubbing) untuk kebutuhan konten media sosial dan iklan
  • Memantau dan merespons interaksi dengan pengikut, termasuk komentar, pesan, dan ulasan di media sosial
  • Membuat copywriting dan berkordinasi dengan tim marketing untuk membuat konten iklan yang efektif
  • Merencanakan dan mengeksekusi endrosement bulanan
  • Menganalisis kinerja kampanye dan konten media sosial dengan menggunakan alat analitik, serta menyusun laporan kinerja
  • Bekerja sama dengan tim pemasaran untuk menyelaraskan strategi media sosial dengan kampanye pemasaran lainnya
  • Mengidentifikasi tren media sosial terbaru dan peluang untuk meningkatkan engagement

Kualifikasi
  • Pendidikan min. SMA atau SMK
  • Pengalaman kerja minimal 1 tahun di bidang Social Media Specialist
  • Memiliki keinginan untuk mengexplore ide-ide baru dan mengikuti tren dalam membuat konten
  • Kreatif dan inovatif dalam mengembangkan ide dan konsep konten
  • Proaktif, inisiatif, dan memiliki motivasi tinggi
  • Memahami tren digital dan mampu beradaptasi dengan perubahan dalam industri media sosial
  • Memiliki pemahaman yang mendalam tentang berbagai platform media sosial dan bagaimana cara menggunakannya untuk memaksimalkan engagement
  • Keterampilan komunikasi yang baik, kreatif, dan mampu menulis copy yang menarik
skills: Digital Marketing, Social Media Marketing & Management, Copywriting

description:
Duties and Responsibilities:
• Implementing application development according to business needs and Company's standards.
• Executing efficient and effective working code based on business requirements as the primary obligation before other responsibilities.
• Analyzing problem contexts and providing technological solutions for business issues.
• Creating ideas, problems, and solutions in a shared medium for product development continuity and team progress.
• Collaborating with all business and IT stakeholders in product development.
• Undertaking responsibilities in overall system architecture and design, ensuring that feature-specific solutions remain consistent with other features in both backend and end-to-end contexts.
• Collaborating to integrate products with internal and external systems of Company.
• Assuming full responsibility with a focus on product completion, including coordinating with the team to prepare infrastructure components, automation scripts for deployment/delivery, and maintaining awareness of the security of developed products.
• Monitoring all backend services during development, testing, and production phases.
• Implementing operational risk management for each business process, including risk identification, assessment, monitoring, control, and mitigation, encompassing data quality and reporting, in accordance with applicable bank regulations, and setting an example as a role model in the context of operational control application.

Minimum Qualifications:
• Holds at least a Bachelor's degree in IT, IS, Computer Science, or a relevant field.
• Possesses excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
• Has a minimum of 3 years of experience working in Back End or equivalent roles.
• Demonstrates initiative, discipline, responsibility, attention to detail, and orderly work.
• Capable of working both individually and in a team, and coordinating with other relevant teams.
• Able to provide input/ideas for improvements within the team.

Required Skills:
• Proficient in programming languages such as Java/.Net/C#/Go.
• Proficient in .Net Core Framework, OOP, SQL Server.
• Possesses a good understanding of microservices and APIs; familiar with RDBMS.
• Experienced in working with databases like Oracle, Elastic, Redis, MongoDB.
• Capable of debugging and troubleshooting.

Additional Skills:
• Experience in leading Backend teams.
• Experience in Containerization & microservices.
• Experience with Kafka & Stream Based Applications.
• Experience with Redis, Caching Strategy & Data Grid.
• Experience with Elastic & Other Non-Relational Databases.
skills: TypeScript, .NET MVC, Angular.js

description:
We are seeking an experienced Backend Developer with deep expertise in Java to join our team at Infosys Solusi Terpadu. As a Senior Developer, you will be responsible for designing and implementing high-performance, scalable backend systems for various digital channels. You’ll lead projects, collaborate with cross-functional teams, and mentor junior developers, contributing to our dynamic environment with an Agile approach.

Requirements
  • Minimum 5 years of experience as a backend developer, specifically using Java.
  • Proficient in Java and frameworks like Spring (Spring Boot, Spring MVC) and Hibernate.
  • Experienced in developing RESTful APIs and working with microservices architecture.
  • Skilled in databases such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, or NoSQL like MongoDB, with the ability to optimize database performance.
  • Knowledgeable in distributed systems and message queues like RabbitMQ or Kafka.
  • Strong understanding of OOP principles, design patterns, and clean code practices.
  • Experienced with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP), Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD tools like Jenkins or GitLab CI.
  • Understanding of multithreading, concurrency, and methods to improve Java application performance.
  • Experience in the banking industry or digital channels (Mobile/Internet Banking) is preferred.
skills: Banking, Software Development, Spring Framework, Java

description:
1. Perencanaan Tambang
Merancang dan mengembangkan rencana penambangan jangka pendek, menengah, dan panjang yang efisien dan aman, Menyusun jadwal kerja harian, mingguan, dan bulanan serta memastikan target produksi dan kualitas tercapai sesuai anggaran, Melakukan pemetaan dan survei tambang untuk memastikan area tambang dikelola dengan optimal.
2. Pengawasan Operasional
Mengawasi seluruh operasi penambangan untuk memastikan kepatuhan terhadap rencana tambang yang telah ditetapkan, Mengelola tim teknis, memastikan kegiatan di lapangan berjalan sesuai standar dan prosedur keselamatan, Memastikan alat berat dan peralatan penambangan berfungsi optimal dan efisien serta melakukan pemantauan terhadap perawatan peralatan.
3. Pengelolaan Keselamatan dan Kepatuhan
Menjamin seluruh operasi sesuai dengan standar K3 (Keselamatan dan Kesehatan Kerja) serta kebijakan lingkungan, Mengidentifikasi potensi bahaya di area tambang dan mengimplementasikan tindakan pencegahan untuk meminimalisir risiko kecelakaan, Bekerja sama dengan tim K3 untuk memastikan pelatihan dan kepatuhan terhadap prosedur keselamatan.
4. Koordinasi dengan Departemen Terkait
Bekerja sama dengan divisi lain seperti produksi, pemeliharaan, dan lingkungan untuk mengoptimalkan kegiatan penambangan, Mengkoordinasikan kebutuhan logistik, peralatan, dan sumber daya agar semua operasional tambang berjalan lancar dan tepat waktu.
5. Analisis dan Pelaporan
Mengumpulkan dan menganalisis data tambang untuk membuat laporan harian, mingguan, dan bulanan mengenai kinerja operasional tambang, Mengevaluasi efisiensi operasi penambangan dan memberikan saran untuk perbaikan serta optimasi proses penambangan, Mengidentifikasi kendala dalam pencapaian target produksi dan mengambil tindakan perbaikan sesuai kebutuhan.
6. Pengembangan Tim
Melakukan pembinaan dan pengawasan terhadap staf teknik tambang dan memastikan mereka memiliki keterampilan yang diperlukan untuk pekerjaan mereka, Menyusun program pelatihan dan pengembangan keterampilan bagi tim teknik agar selalu up-to-date dengan teknologi dan prosedur terbaru di bidang penambangan.
7. Pengelolaan Anggaran
Mengelola anggaran untuk operasi penambangan, termasuk biaya operasional, perawatan peralatan, dan alokasi sumber daya, Memastikan seluruh kegiatan tambang berjalan sesuai anggaran tanpa mengorbankan kualitas dan keamanan operasi.
skills: Communicative, Teamwork, Microsoft Office

description:
The Opportunity
Are you fun, flexible and overflowing with inspiration? IDPods is looking for a creative problem solver ready to take on challenging design briefs. Join us if you have an eye for beauty and commitment to crafting exceptional brand designs.
CAN JOIN ASAP

Job Description
- Conceptualise and design branding/marketing materials or advertisements
- Produce new artwork based on brand guidelines agreed with our marketing team
- Create print and digital advertising materials
- Create brand identity and style guide for the company’s marketing needs
- Assist in management of website, newsletters and all other company materials, where necessary
- Design all graphic, sales and marketing materials e.g. EDM / Posters / Banners / Sales Display
- Work according to briefs for the branding needs and guidelines
- Ensure design specifications are production-ready
- Engage with external printers or contractors/suppliers/vendors to ensure highest quality and deadlines are met
- Proper documentation of all design files.

Skills Required:
- High competency in Adobe Creative Suite especially Illustrator and Photoshop
- Skilled in Mockup 3D products and Blender (is a MUST)
- Skilled in, photography and videography
- Knowledge of print production, colours codes, formats, etc
- Knowledge of editing of photography in Adobe Photoshop or Lightroom
- Skilled in Adobe InDesign for desktop publishing
- Ability to convey client's message in line with brand’s guidelines through original design

What we’re looking for in you:
  • Desire to learn and adapt to new technologies
  • Able to work independently and proactively in a team
  • Strong communication skills to liaise with marketing team and external vendors
  • Ability to prioritize and manage multiple projects deadlines
  • Positive attitude and willingness to learn
  • Keen eye for detail
skills: High Initiative, Creative Design, Product Photography, detail oriented, Adobe Illustrator, 3D Design, Video Editing, 2D Animation, Adobe Creative Suite, Videography

location: Duren Sawit, Jakarta Timur, DKI Jakarta
description:
JavaMifi is a Technology company that provides connectivity & Internet of Things products including Wifi Internet Unlimited for both Indonesian customers and international travelers. We are looking for an energetic Ecommerce Specialist - Tech Product & Electronic with the following qualifications :

Job Responsibilities:

- Responsible for day to day marketplace sales & marketing activity (Shoope,Tokopedia, Tiktok, etc)
- Write and edit product content that will be published on e-Commerce websites/portals.
- Set standards and best practices for new product listings, content creation, distribution, and maintenance.
- Design banner and edit photo for urgent publications in eccomerce platforms
- Develop and implement strategies to boost ecommerce sales and customer engagement
- Develop and maintain effective promotion throughout online selling channels.
- Manage relationships with external third parties in the marketplace eCommerce person.
- Responsible to do the Sales Report, Promotion and Ads in Marketplace e-Commerce.
- Create Content Event Marketplace to get more engagement and sales.
- Work closely with Product & Marketing Team and identifying and evaluating new potential product and campaigns.
- In charge of Market Analyst, Market Research, Competitor Analysis, and Product Research to get the winning product.
- Analyze sales and customer behavior data to adjust strategies and achieve sales targets
- Create content, copywriting, targeting analyst for Facebook CPAS.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure cohesive brand messaging and customer experience.
- Monitor and manage inventory to meet demand and prevent stockouts.

Requirements

- Minimum of 3+ years experience in a fast-paced, e-Commerce business including TikTok Shop.
- Hands-on experience in managing and maintaining e-Commerce websites/portals.
- Knowledgeable of the e-Commerce space that includes marketing strategies, product development, competitive strategies, consumer research, industry trends, and usability best practices.
- Knowledge of various platforms and online sales strategies can be used to conduct digital sales or website conversions.
- Having experience use design software (canva, adobe photoshop,etc) and a keen eye for detail.
- Having huge interest in Technology Products & Electronics
- Analytical and multitasking skills
- Experience to do Live Shopping is a plus.

If you are a strategic and self-driven individual, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity. We can’t wait to meet you!
skills: E-commerce, Sales Strategy, Information Technology, Graphic Design, Online Advertising, Purchasing Negotiation

description:
PENEMPATAN : AREA JAKARTA JAKARTA PUSAT - TIMUR - BARAT DAN SEKITARNYA

Deskripsi Pekerjaan: Kami mencari Barista Mobile yang bersemangat dan antusias untuk bergabung dalam tim kami. Tugas utamanya adalah menjual kopi keliling menggunakan motor listrik di area tertentu. Anda akan bertanggung jawab memastikan pelanggan menikmati kopi berkualitas tinggi dengan pelayanan yang ramah dan menyenangkan.

Tanggung Jawab:

Menjual dan menyajikan kopi berkualitas kepada pelanggan di berbagai lokasi.

Mengoperasikan motor listrik dengan aman dan sesuai aturan lalu lintas.

Memastikan kebersihan dan perawatan motor serta peralatan kerja.

Mengelola stok bahan baku dan perlengkapan minuman.

Membangun hubungan baik dengan pelanggan untuk meningkatkan kepuasan dan loyalitas.

Menyusun laporan harian tentang penjualan dan stok.

Persyaratan:

Pria/Wanita, usia 18-35 tahun.
Mempunyai HP android & RAM 4

Sopan, ramah, dan memiliki kemampuan komunikasi yang baik.

Memiliki disiplin kerja yang tinggi dan dapat bekerja mandiri.

Bersedia bekerja di luar ruangan dan berpindah-pindah lokasi.

Menyukai tantangan dan memiliki minat di bidang kopi.

Benefit:

Gaji Pokok: [1.600.000]

Insentif penjualan berdasarkan pencapaian

Motor listrik dan perlengkapan kerja disediakan.

Pelatihan barista dan pengetahuan tentang kopi.

Lingkungan kerja yang dinamis dan berkesempatan untuk berkembang.

Jika Anda tertarik untuk bergabung dan memenuhi kriteria, kirimkan CV dan lamaran Anda

description:
JOB SUMMARY
Campaign & Media Officer assists the Impact Department (Liberty Society Foundation) with designing, creating, editing, and publishing relevant media / visual content based on the foundation’s objectives to generate & increase engagement through various media platforms.

DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES
  1. Creative Marketing & Visual Media Creation
  2. Create & design visually compelling graphics and visuals for media content & campaign collaterals, including social media contents, posters, and/or not limited to other similar collaterals needed.
  3. Utilize design platforms like Canva & Capcut, and other relevant tools (Adobe Illustrator, etc).
  4. Stay updated with design trends, techniques, and emerging design tools.
  5. Ensure all designs align with brand guidelines, maintaining consistency in visual elements and messaging.
  6. Collaborate with the marketing team and Impact Lead to creatively visualize impact reports.
  7. Campaign & Content Strategy
  8. Keep consistent Liberty Society Foundation marketing communications across all platforms.
  9. Plan content briefs, initiatives, and campaigns aimed at increasing social media performance and engagement.
  10. Develop & create a detailed content calendar & production.
  11. Create and curate engaging and shareable content briefs & copy that aligns with the brand's mission and value, for Liberty Society's internal platforms, including Instagram and LinkedIn.
  12. Some other functions
  13. Assist and help other marketing initiatives of Liberty Society Foundation
  14. Work with internal and external collaborators and creative resources to deliver content visuals / assets that are coherent with our brand voice and strategy.
MINIMUM KNOWLEDGE AND SKILL REQUIREMENTS
  1. Bachelor's degree in graphic design, visual communications, or a related field.
  2. 1-2 Years experience in a similar field. Fresh graduate can apply.
  3. Proven experience as a graphic designer, preferably in a marketing or social media-focused role.
  4. Proficient in design software such as Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and/or similar or assisting platforms (Canva, etc).
  5. Strong understanding of visual design principles, typography, and color theory.
  6. Ability to create engaging and visually appealing designs for social media platforms, with a focus on Instagram.
  7. Familiarity with video editing tools such as CapCut and Adobe Premiere Pro.
  8. Detail-oriented with excellent organizational and time management skills.
  9. Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced environment, effectively managing multiple projects and deadlines.
  10. Knowledge of brand guidelines and ability to create designs that align with brand visual identity.
  11. Portfolio demonstrating a range of creative designs and expertise in digital and social media graphics.
skills: Content Management, Content Creation, Graphic Design, Social Media Marketing & Management

location: Kapanewon Temon, Kulon Progo, DI Yogyakarta
description:
Kualifikasi:
- Pendidikan Min. D3 (segala jurusan)
- Memiliki pengalaman sebagai sales supervisor min. 1-2 tahun
- Komunikatif, kreatif dan inovatif
- Berorientasi pada target
- Mampu bernegosiasi dengan baik
- Mampu bekerja di bawah tekanan
- Terbiasa membuat laporan dengan Ms. Office
- Memiliki kemampuan komunikasi dan attitude yang baik
- Memiliki kemampuan leadership yang baik
- Domisili Yogyakarta, Kulon Progo
- Penempatan Bandara Internasional Yogyakarta (YIA)

Job Deskripsi:
- Melakukan promosi dan negosiasi kepada customer retail ataupun B2B terkait produk
- Memonitoring dan memastikan pencapaian sales di area dan outlet secara harian dan mingguan serta bulanan.
- Canvasing ke calon customer B2B dan mencapai target sales
- Memonitoring dan melakukan training terhadap semua staf outlet yang berada di area supervisinya
- Memastikan semua staff outlet melakukan penjualan sesuai SOP perusahaan dan selalu berusaha untuk mencapai target
- Membuat call plan dan melakukan kunjungan rutin customer sesuai dengan call plannya untuk menjaga dan meningkatkan hubungan bisnis dengan customer.
- Bertanggung jawab untuk memastikan forecasting (perencanaan penjualan) di area yang menjadi tanggung jawabnya
- Melakukan visit (kunjungan) dan memastikan tercapainya target Retensi (repeat order) & juga NOO (new open outlet) dan di area yang sudah di tentukan.
- Membuat sales report dan admistratif penjualan ke atasan dengan tepat waktu (report harian maupun bulanan)
- Menginformasikan dan mengimplementasikan perubahan kebijakan perusahaan (perubahan harga, promosi, dll) untuk diketahui secepatnya oleh team
- Mengetahui angka stock dan order di outlet yang menjadi tanggung jawabnya
- Melaksanakan dan mencapai target/omset yang diberikan
skills: Sales Analysis, Sales Operations, Sales Management

description:
Job Descriptions
  • Membuat dan merancang materi branding atau iklan
  • Membuat materi iklan cetak dan digital
  • Mengembangkan Visual Utama dan Materi Pendukung untuk Kampanye Pemasaran
  • Membantu dalam pengelolaan situs web, buletin, dan lainnya
  • Mendesain materi grafis, penjualan, dan pemasaran, misalnya EDM / Poster / Spanduk / Display Penjualan
  • Mengelola Desain dari Konsep hingga Produksi
  • Berinteraksi dengan percetakan eksternal atau kontraktor/pemasok untuk memastikan kualitas terbaik dan pemenuhan tenggat waktu
  • Mendokumentasikan dengan baik semua file desain
Job Requirements
  • Pendidikan minimal S1 Desain Komunikasi Visual
  • Pengalaman minimal 1 tahun di bidang yang sama
  • Terampil dalam fotografi dan videografi
